title: Eggplant with Balado Sambal
description: A very simple recipe for lunch, easy to make and very delicious, perfect for breakfast, lunch or dinner, serve it with warm rice and you ready to go!
directions: Cut the eggplant lengthwise, sear it with a little bit of oil until it's a bit tender. Set aside
While the eggplant is cooking, in a food processor add chilies, garlic, shallots, and tomato. Blitz few times, until you got a rough chop consistency.
Pre-heat pan, add oil, chili mixture, and keffir lime leaves to the pan, saut√© few minutes until it fragrant.
Once it's fragrant, add mushroom powder, then do a taste check and then add cooked eggplant, cook it for 10 minutes in medium low heat.
Once it's done, serve it with warm rice!
